summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mostly lower on Monday.
title: Bitcoin mining report: March 27
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mostly lower on Monday, with two gaining and the other 17 declining.
Bitcoin fell 2.7% to $26,977 by market close.
